title: IFN gamma Monoclonal Antibody (XMG1.2), eFluor 660, eBioscience
author: Liu J; Liu Y; Panda S; Liu A; Lei J; Burd I
description: Invitrogen Anti-IFN gamma Monoclonal (XMG1.2), eBioscience, Catalog # 50-7311-82. Tested in Flow Cytometry (Flow) applications. This antibody reacts with Mouse samples. Supplied as 100 µg purified antibody (0.2 mg/mL).
